Player History
Injured on 4/4/1969 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for full season...
Released by Oakland on 4/1/1973...
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1976...
Had first career hit on 4/6/1978, off Tug McGraw (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/26/1978, off Rick Sutcliffe (PHI)...
Injured on 7/14/1980 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Traded from St. Louis to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1981 (Going to STL: P B. Farmer, P F. Martinez, C J. Harrell. Going to CHC: SS A. Trammell)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Los Angeles on 4/13/1981...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 1981...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Houston on 8/18/1982...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 1982...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Minnesota on 6/23/1983 (Going to CHC: P S. Dunning. Going to MIN: SS A. Trammell)...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 8/7/1984...
Drove in 6 runs against Cleveland on 6/8/1985...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1986, hitting .520 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1987, hitting .387 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1987, hitting .304 with 6 HR, 21 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1988, hitting .519 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1988...
Injured on 7/19/1990 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/10/1991 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/12/1991 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 2000th career hit on 7/16/1992, off Rod Beck (CLE)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1993, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
